title: Hera Pheri (2000)
description: Three unemployed men find the answer to all their money problems when they receive a call from a kidnapper. However, things do not go as planned.

title: Asur: Welcome to Your Dark Side
description: A unique crime thriller that pits two opposing worlds against each other. The less explored, intricate world of forensic science and the deep mysticism of ancient Indian Mythology.

title: Panchayat
description: Panchayat is a comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a Panchayat office in a remote village of Uttar Pradesh.
